metadata.title: Lowping Hosting
metadata.description: Join a hosting service made for you! With servers for Minecraft, VPS, and other games, we offer the best experience for gamers and developers. Try it now!

reviews.title: Our customers' experiences speak volumes!
reviews.description: Step into the stories of those who trust us for their needs. Their words paint a vivid picture of the quality, care, and satisfaction we strive to deliver in every interaction.

no_results.title: Looks like we don't support this game yet...
no_results.description: Try using different keywords or check the complete list.

descriptions.minecraft: Minecraft is a sandbox game where players explore randomly generated worlds and build anything they can imagine — from simple houses to entire cities — using blocks. With survival, creative, and multiplayer modes, it offers complete freedom for creation and adventure.
descriptions.terraria: Terraria is a 2D adventure game with elements of building, mining, combat, and exploration. With dozens of bosses, biomes, and equipment, the game combines retro style with deep and addictive gameplay.
descriptions.factorio: Factorio is an automation game where the goal is to build and expand automated factories to extract resources, produce items, and defend your base from alien creatures. It's ideal for those who enjoy logic, efficiency, and strategic planning.
descriptions.space-engineers-torch: Space Engineers is a space sandbox focused on engineering, construction, and exploration. With support for detailed constructions of ships, space stations, and land vehicles, it offers realistic physics and cooperative multiplayer. The Torch version is optimized for dedicated servers.
descriptions.palworld: Palworld is an unusual mix of Pokémon with survival and armed combat. You can capture creatures called 'Pals', use them for battles, build bases, grow crops, or even set up factories with monster slave labor. Yes, it's that chaotic.
descriptions.satisfactory: Satisfactory is a first-person automation game where you build colossal factories on an alien planet. Explore, collect resources, face hostile creatures, and optimize production lines with conveyor belts, vehicles, and drones.
descriptions.counter-strike-2: Counter-Strike 2 is the new generation of the iconic competitive FPS. With graphical improvements, renewed physics, and a dynamic smoke system, CS2 maintains the classic formula of confrontation between terrorists and counter-terrorists with modern refinements.
descriptions.rust: Rust is a hardcore online survival game where danger comes from all sides: hunger, radiation, cold... and other players. Build bases, craft weapons, form alliances (or betray them) and fight to survive in a merciless world.
descriptions.valheim: Valheim is a survival and exploration game set in Viking mythology. Face legendary monsters, build villages, navigate oceans, and unravel secrets in diverse biomes as you seek to prove your worth to Odin.
descriptions.v-rising: V Rising is an action and survival RPG where you play as a newly awakened vampire. Build your castle, drain blood from enemies, face hunters, and fight for power in a dark and gothic world.
descriptions.ark-survival-evolved: ARK: Survival Evolved is a survival game in a prehistoric world full of dinosaurs. Tame creatures, build bases, and face challenges from nature and other players in a hostile and expansive world.
descriptions.ark-survival-ascended: ARK: Survival Ascended is the Unreal Engine 5 remake of the original ARK, bringing updated graphics, performance improvements, and cross-platform mod support. Jurassic survival has never been so beautiful (and brutal).

info.title: What is a VPS?
info.description: A Virtual Private Server (VPS) is a virtualized dedicated server that offers exclusive resources and complete control over your hosting environment.

control_section.title: Have complete control of your server
control_section.description: With a VPS, you have complete root access, allowing you to customize every aspect of your environment. Install any software, configure your server exactly as you need, and have the freedom to create the perfect environment for your projects.

dedicated_resources.title: Dedicated resources
dedicated_resources.description: CPU, memory, and storage guaranteed exclusively for you

advanced_security.title: Advanced security
advanced_security.description: Customizable security settings and complete isolation

high_performance.title: High performance

complete_customization.title: Complete customization

performance.heading: Superior performance for your applications!
performance.description: Have more control and performance with VPS servers! Even in virtual environments, you have guaranteed resource allocation and lower risk of interference from other users. This results in greater stability, faster responses, and a smoother experience for your games, websites, or systems.

scalability.description: With VPS, you can start with a plan that meets your current needs and easily scale as your project grows. Add more CPU, RAM, or storage when you need it by contacting us. It will always be a pleasure to help!

faq.subtitle: frequently asked questions
faq.title: Everything you need to know about VPS

items.question: What is a VPS?
items.answer: VPS stands for Virtual Private Server. It's a virtual server that operates on a shared physical machine, but has dedicated and isolated resources, offering control and performance similar to a dedicated server, but at a lower cost.

items.question: What are the advantages of using a VPS instead of shared hosting?
items.answer: A VPS offers dedicated resources, greater security due to isolation, complete control over the server environment (including root access), better performance, and the ability to handle traffic spikes. Ideal for projects that need more resources and customization.

items.question: Can I install any operating system on a VPS?
items.answer: Yes, one of the main advantages of a VPS is the ability to choose and install the operating system of your preference, such as various Linux versions (Ubuntu, CentOS, Debian) or Windows Server.

items.question: Do I need technical knowledge to manage a VPS?
items.answer: Yes, managing a VPS requires basic server administration knowledge. However, there are control panels that make many tasks easier, and our support team will be available to assist when necessary.

items.question: When will Lowping make VPS services available?
items.answer: We're working hard to launch our VPS services soon. Register your interest through the 'I'm interested' button and you'll be notified as soon as the service is available.

features.title: Exclusive features for you
features.description: Experience Minecraft hosting that prioritizes simplicity and efficiency.

plugins_manager.title: Plugin manager
plugins_manager.description: Install plugins easily and quickly. We have a library of plugins ready for installation! Optionally, you can add your own with just a few clicks.

one_click_installer.title: One-click installer
one_click_installer.description: Install the desired software for your Minecraft server (Spigot, Paper, etc.) with just one click. Don't waste time with complicated configurations, we take care of that for you.

files_manager.title: File manager
files_manager.description: Access all your server files with ease. Upload, download, and edit files directly from the control panel. But of course, you can also use SFTP if you prefer!

auto_backup.title: Automatic backup
auto_backup.description: Never lose your data again! With automatic backup, you can restore your server at any time. You can choose the frequency of backups and we'll take care of them for you!

pterodactyl_panel.title: Pterodactyl Panel
pterodactyl_panel.description: Manage your server with the Pterodactyl panel, one of the best control panels on the market. With an intuitive and easy-to-use interface, you'll have complete control over your server.

ddos_protection.title: DDoS Protection
ddos_protection.description: Protect your server against DDoS attacks with our advanced protection. We constantly monitor your server's traffic and block any attacks before they reach you.
